title: Why do laptops or mobile phones charge quickly in airplane mode? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is because Airplane mode turns off the antennas in the phone with one click. It turns off the following: WifiBluetoothRadio (Mobile network)If these are switched on, it is like using water from a tank while it is filling up. So it charges slower.
